author: Rukmini S
title: Locked down with their abusers: India's domestic violence surge
description: As world's largest coronavirus lockdown is extended to May 3, National Commission for Women reports spike in complaints.
content:
Chennai, India - When the beating began on March 25, Parvathi* tried the usual things first, but things were different under the nation-wide coronavirus lockdown.
As her husband began beating her, she would run out into the narrow lanes of the slum she lives… [+7027 chars]
